multiplechoiceresponse.label: Given a list L of integers, which of the following expressions compute the average of the elements in the list?

choicegroup.choice: reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, l) / reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, map(lambda x: 1, l))
reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, l) / reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, map(lambda x: x, l))
reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, l) / map(lambda x: x, reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, l))
reduce(lambda x,y: x+y, l) / reduce(lambda x,y: 1+1, l)
